title: @riot Sale bug?
body:
It says the Rek'Sai bundle is on sale in my client, but it sure as hell doesnt look like its on sale being 975RP for both Champ and Skin.

Pic Related.

replies.body: that's not the bundle, that's why.
Eternum Rek'Sai is a 1350RP skin down to 975RP at the moment. That's the sale, There is no bug.
i had thought so, but it should still display properly as the bundle rather than both at no reduced price.
